divs: Sighting Detailsstanding on deck of house south side just got dark flashing orange and reddish light coming towards us me and my son tyler goes by towards the north starts getting dimmer within 2 seconds it dissapeared and within 5 seconds reappears to the south again does this about 10 times once it did a circle before before it dissapeared
trends: There has been one other sighting in Deerfield
There were no other sightings in Deerfield on or around May 18th 2012
